s2_text: Power up to three electronic appliances and three USB-powered devices. The three HomeKit-enabled AC power outlets are separately switchable and Wi-Fi enabled.
s3_text: Apple HomeKit technology provides an easy, secure way to control HomeKit-enabled accessories from your iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, or Apple Watch.
s4_text: Control your HomeKit-enabled accessories with your voice using Siri.
s5_text: Provide advanced security by end-to-end encryption and authentication between a HomeKit-enabled accessory and your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch.
s6_text: With the Koogeek Home app, you can easily control, monitor and schedule multiple connected accessories separately through easy setup and a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network connection.
s7_text: You can set custom schedules and timers for a connected accessory or scene to meet your daily routine.
s8_title: Create Scenes to Control Multiple Accessories
s8_text: Use a suggested scene or create a custom one to control multiple accessories at the same time. Turn a scene on or off by tapping it, setting a schedule/timer or just asking Siri.
s9_text: Check the status of your plugged-in devices and monitor real-time, daily and monthly electric power consumption of the three AC outlets.
s10_text: You can set up your Apple TV or iPad as a home hub to control your HomeKit accessories remotely, grant access, and automate your accessories.
s11_text: Apple MFi certified. Intelligently detect connected devices and support safe and fast USB charging for iPod, iPhone or iPad, with a total output current of up to 4.1A. Compatible with other USB-powered devices.
s13_text: With an independent control switch and an independent LED indicator for each power outlet, turn an outlet on or off and know the on/off state easily.
